meta.job_title: Travel Nurse RN PCU - Progressive Care Unit

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide patient care in a progressive care unit, monitoring and managing the condition of acutely ill patients.
Use critical thinking to assess and respond to patient needs, collaborating with a multidisciplinary team to provide optimal care.
Work in a team-oriented environment, maintaining effective communication and collaboration with colleagues and healthcare professionals.
Demonstrate strong interpersonal skills when interacting with patients, families, and caregivers, providing emotional support and reassurance.
Adapt to changes in patient conditions, treatment plans, and unit priorities, ensuring high-quality care at all times.
Pay attention to detail in documenting patient information, administering medications, and implementing care plans accurately and efficiently.
Show empathy and compassion towards patients and their families, understanding and responding to their emotional and psychological needs.
Make critical decisions under pressure, prioritizing tasks and interventions based on patient acuity and unit workload.
Manage stress effectively in a fast-paced environment, maintaining composure and focus while delivering safe and competent care.
